column2: Go to the Menu bar and Click on 'Publish'
Click on sub menu: 'Publish this OrganicLinks database'
Go to this link for the generated HTML code: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/khoivan88/organiclinks-v2/googlesheet/_site/organicsyntheticfaculty.html
Copy the HTML code into OrganicSyntheticFaculty page in DOC Wordpress
